page.title: 12TREORCHY LIBRARY
page.content: THIS MODERN LIBRARY{BUILT IN 1971}IS SITUATED OFF CENTRAL TREORCHY SQUARE OPPOSITE THE PARC AND DARE HALL IS CLOSE PROXIMITY TO THE LOCAL COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL.AT THE TIME OF OUR SURVEY IT HAD A TOTAL OF OVER {52,000 BOOKS,3,000 RECORDS AND 1,000 {CASSETTES.}THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY {4,000 CHILDRENS BOOKS}.FINES FOR OVERDUE BOOKS ARE CHARGED AT {12P PER {WEEK.}THE MOST POPULAR TIMES FOR BORROWING ARE FRIDAY AND SATURDAY, WEDNESDAY BEING THE LEAST POPULAR. {ROMANCES AND THRILLERS ARE MOST {POPULAR WITH ADULTS,CHILDREN FAVOUR {ADVENTURE BOOKS}.AT PRESENT THERE ARE {4,141 MEMBERS}WHICH IS LESS THAN 20 OR 30 YEARS AGO.TODAY,MUCH INFORMATION IS STORED ON MICROFILM AND THERE MAY BE PLANS TO BEGIN A VIDEO-FILM LENDING LIBRARY.
